pullrequest.title: issue #1523: process selection msgs in qt connection event in GLWidget

content.raw:
I made a fix in [issue_1523_gazebo5_ian](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/3a5fd0e2dc463cfbccbf71a908c0143c44566666). It's mainly a threading issue and the changes in my branch ensure that the selection msgs are processed in the main rendering thread. Selection across multiple gzclients should now work and any one should be able to publish to the `~/selection` topic. 

On the other hand - I am not sure about the behavior of model selection one gzclient highlighting the model in another client though. I feel that users may not necessary want that.
